name: Real.tan_add
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : Or (And (‚àÄ (k : Int), Ne x (HDiv.hDiv (HMul.hMul (HAdd.hAdd (HMul.hMul 2 ‚Üëk) 1) Real.pi) 2)) (‚àÄ (l : Int), Ne y (HDiv.hDiv (HMul.hMul (HAdd.hAdd (HMul.hMul 2 ‚Üël) 1) Real.pi) 2))) (And (Exists fun k => Eq x (HDiv.hDiv (HMul.hMul (HAdd.hAdd (HMul.hMul 2 ‚Üëk) 1) Real.pi) 2)) (Exists fun l => Eq y (HDiv.hDiv (HMul.hMul (HAdd.hAdd (HMul.hMul 2 ‚Üël) 1) Real.pi) 2)))
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.tan (HAdd.hAdd x y)) (HDiv.hDiv (HAdd.hAdd (Real.tan x) (Real.tan y)) (HSub.hSub 1 (HMul.hMul (Real.tan x) (Real.tan y))))
decl:
theorem tan_add {x y : ‚Ñù}
    (h : ((‚àÄ k : ‚Ñ§, x ‚â† (2 * k + 1) * œÄ / 2) ‚àß ‚àÄ l : ‚Ñ§, y ‚â† (2 * l + 1) * œÄ / 2) ‚à®
      (‚àÉ k : ‚Ñ§, x = (2 * k + 1) * œÄ / 2) ‚àß ‚àÉ l : ‚Ñ§, y = (2 * l + 1) * œÄ / 2) :
    tan (x + y) = (tan x + tan y) / (1 - tan x * tan y) := by
  simpa only [‚Üê Complex.ofReal_inj, Complex.ofReal_sub, Complex.ofReal_add, Complex.ofReal_div,
    Complex.ofReal_mul, Complex.ofReal_tan] using
    @Complex.tan_add (x : ‚ÑÇ) (y : ‚ÑÇ) (by convert h <;> norm_cast)

name: Real.tan_add'
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : And (‚àÄ (k : Int), Ne x (HDiv.hDiv (HMul.hMul (HAdd.hAdd (HMul.hMul 2 ‚Üëk) 1) Real.pi) 2)) (‚àÄ (l : Int), Ne y (HDiv.hDiv (HMul.hMul (HAdd.hAdd (HMul.hMul 2 ‚Üël) 1) Real.pi) 2))
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.tan (HAdd.hAdd x y)) (HDiv.hDiv (HAdd.hAdd (Real.tan x) (Real.tan y)) (HSub.hSub 1 (HMul.hMul (Real.tan x) (Real.tan y))))
decl:
theorem tan_add' {x y : ‚Ñù}
    (h : (‚àÄ k : ‚Ñ§, x ‚â† (2 * k + 1) * œÄ / 2) ‚àß ‚àÄ l : ‚Ñ§, y ‚â† (2 * l + 1) * œÄ / 2) :
    tan (x + y) = (tan x + tan y) / (1 - tan x * tan y) :=
  tan_add (Or.inl h)

name: Real.tan_two_mul
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.tan (HMul.hMul 2 x)) (HDiv.hDiv (HMul.hMul 2 (Real.tan x)) (HSub.hSub 1 (HPow.hPow (Real.tan x) 2)))
decl:
theorem tan_two_mul {x : ‚Ñù} : tan (2 * x) = 2 * tan x / (1 - tan x ^ 2) := by
  have := @Complex.tan_two_mul x
  norm_cast at *

name: Real.tan_int_mul_pi_div_two
decl:
theorem tan_int_mul_pi_div_two (n : ‚Ñ§) : tan (n * œÄ / 2) = 0 :=
  tan_eq_zero_iff.mpr (by use n)

name: Real.continuousOn_tan
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ ContinuousOn Real.tan (setOf fun x => Ne (Real.cos x) 0)
decl:
theorem continuousOn_tan : ContinuousOn tan {x | cos x ‚â† 0} := by
  suffices ContinuousOn (fun x => sin x / cos x) {x | cos x ‚â† 0} by
    have h_eq : (fun x => sin x / cos x) = tan := by ext1 x; rw [tan_eq_sin_div_cos]
    rwa [h_eq] at this
  exact continuousOn_sin.div continuousOn_cos fun x => id

name: Real.continuous_tan
decl:
@[continuity]
theorem continuous_tan : Continuous fun x : {x | cos x ‚â† 0} => tan x :=
  continuousOn_iff_continuous_restrict.1 continuousOn_tan

name: Real.continuousOn_tan_Ioo
decl:
theorem continuousOn_tan_Ioo : ContinuousOn tan (Ioo (-(œÄ / 2)) (œÄ / 2)) := by
  refine ContinuousOn.mono continuousOn_tan fun x => ?_
  simp only [and_imp, mem_Ioo, mem_setOf_eq, Ne]
  rw [cos_eq_zero_iff]
  rintro hx_gt hx_lt ‚ü®r, hxr_eq‚ü©
  rcases le_or_lt 0 r with h | h
  ¬∑ rw [lt_iff_not_ge] at hx_lt
    refine hx_lt ?_
    rw [hxr_eq, ‚Üê one_mul (œÄ / 2), mul_div_assoc, ge_iff_le, mul_le_mul_right (half_pos pi_pos)]
    simp [h]
  ¬∑ rw [lt_iff_not_ge] at hx_gt
    refine hx_gt ?_
    rw [hxr_eq, ‚Üê one_mul (œÄ / 2), mul_div_assoc, ge_iff_le, neg_mul_eq_neg_mul,
      mul_le_mul_right (half_pos pi_pos)]
    have hr_le : r ‚â§ -1 := by rwa [Int.lt_iff_add_one_le, ‚Üê le_neg_iff_add_nonpos_right] at h
    rw [‚Üê le_sub_iff_add_le, mul_comm, ‚Üê le_div_iff‚ÇÄ]
    ¬∑ norm_num
      rw [‚Üê Int.cast_one, ‚Üê Int.cast_neg]; norm_cast
    ¬∑ exact zero_lt_two

name: Real.surjOn_tan
decl:
theorem surjOn_tan : SurjOn tan (Ioo (-(œÄ / 2)) (œÄ / 2)) univ :=
  have := neg_lt_self pi_div_two_pos
  continuousOn_tan_Ioo.surjOn_of_tendsto (nonempty_Ioo.2 this)
    (by rw [tendsto_comp_coe_Ioo_atBot this]; exact tendsto_tan_neg_pi_div_two)
    (by rw [tendsto_comp_coe_Ioo_atTop this]; exact tendsto_tan_pi_div_two)

name: Real.tan_surjective
decl: theorem tan_surjective : Function.Surjective tan := fun _ => surjOn_tan.subset_range trivial

name: Real.image_tan_Ioo
decl:
theorem image_tan_Ioo : tan '' Ioo (-(œÄ / 2)) (œÄ / 2) = univ :=
  univ_subset_iff.1 surjOn_tan

name: Real.tan_arctan
decl:
@[simp]
theorem tan_arctan (x : ‚Ñù) : tan (arctan x) = x :=
  tanOrderIso.apply_symm_apply x

name: Real.arctan_mem_Ioo
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Membership.mem (Set.Ioo (Neg.neg (HDiv.hDiv Real.pi 2)) (HDiv.hDiv Real.pi 2)) (Real.arctan x)
decl:
theorem arctan_mem_Ioo (x : ‚Ñù) : arctan x ‚àà Ioo (-(œÄ / 2)) (œÄ / 2) :=
  Subtype.coe_prop _

name: Real.range_arctan
decl:
@[simp]
theorem range_arctan : range arctan = Ioo (-(œÄ / 2)) (œÄ / 2) :=
  ((EquivLike.surjective _).range_comp _).trans Subtype.range_coe

name: Real.arctan_tan
initialProofState:
x : Real
hx‚ÇÅ : LT.lt (Neg.neg (HDiv.hDiv Real.pi 2)) x
hx‚ÇÇ : LT.lt x (HDiv.hDiv Real.pi 2)
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.arctan (Real.tan x)) x
decl:
theorem arctan_tan {x : ‚Ñù} (hx‚ÇÅ : -(œÄ / 2) < x) (hx‚ÇÇ : x < œÄ / 2) : arctan (tan x) = x :=
  Subtype.ext_iff.1 <| tanOrderIso.symm_apply_apply ‚ü®x, hx‚ÇÅ, hx‚ÇÇ‚ü©

name: Real.cos_arctan_pos
decl:
theorem cos_arctan_pos (x : ‚Ñù) : 0 < cos (arctan x) :=
  cos_pos_of_mem_Ioo <| arctan_mem_Ioo x

name: Real.cos_sq_arctan
decl:
theorem cos_sq_arctan (x : ‚Ñù) : cos (arctan x) ^ 2 = 1 / (1 + x ^ 2) := by
  rw_mod_cast [one_div, ‚Üê inv_one_add_tan_sq (cos_arctan_pos x).ne', tan_arctan]

name: Real.sin_arctan
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.sin (Real.arctan x)) (HDiv.hDiv x (HAdd.hAdd 1 (HPow.hPow x 2)).sqrt)
decl:
theorem sin_arctan (x : ‚Ñù) : sin (arctan x) = x / ‚àö(1 + x ^ 2) := by
  rw_mod_cast [‚Üê tan_div_sqrt_one_add_tan_sq (cos_arctan_pos x), tan_arctan]

name: Real.cos_arctan
decl:
theorem cos_arctan (x : ‚Ñù) : cos (arctan x) = 1 / ‚àö(1 + x ^ 2) := by
  rw_mod_cast [one_div, ‚Üê inv_sqrt_one_add_tan_sq (cos_arctan_pos x), tan_arctan]

name: Real.arctan_lt_pi_div_two
decl:
theorem arctan_lt_pi_div_two (x : ‚Ñù) : arctan x < œÄ / 2 :=
  (arctan_mem_Ioo x).2

name: Real.neg_pi_div_two_lt_arctan
decl:
theorem neg_pi_div_two_lt_arctan (x : ‚Ñù) : -(œÄ / 2) < arctan x :=
  (arctan_mem_Ioo x).1

name: Real.arctan_eq_arcsin
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.arctan x) (Real.arcsin (HDiv.hDiv x (HAdd.hAdd 1 (HPow.hPow x 2)).sqrt))
decl:
theorem arctan_eq_arcsin (x : ‚Ñù) : arctan x = arcsin (x / ‚àö(1 + x ^ 2)) :=
  Eq.symm <| arcsin_eq_of_sin_eq (sin_arctan x) (mem_Icc_of_Ioo <| arctan_mem_Ioo x)

name: Real.arcsin_eq_arctan
initialProofState:
x : Real
h : Membership.mem (Set.Ioo (-1) 1) x
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.arcsin x) (Real.arctan (HDiv.hDiv x (HSub.hSub 1 (HPow.hPow x 2)).sqrt))
decl:
theorem arcsin_eq_arctan {x : ‚Ñù} (h : x ‚àà Ioo (-(1 : ‚Ñù)) 1) :
    arcsin x = arctan (x / ‚àö(1 - x ^ 2)) := by
  rw_mod_cast [arctan_eq_arcsin, div_pow, sq_sqrt, one_add_div, div_div, ‚Üê sqrt_mul,
    mul_div_cancel‚ÇÄ, sub_add_cancel, sqrt_one, div_one] <;> simp at h <;> nlinarith [h.1, h.2]

name: Real.arctan_zero
decl:
@[simp]
theorem arctan_zero : arctan 0 = 0 := by simp [arctan_eq_arcsin]

name: Real.arctan_strictMono
decl:
@[mono]
theorem arctan_strictMono : StrictMono arctan := tanOrderIso.symm.strictMono

name: Real.arctan_lt_arctan
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hxy : LT.lt x y
‚ä¢ LT.lt (Real.arctan x) (Real.arctan y)
decl:
@[gcongr]
lemma arctan_lt_arctan {x y : ‚Ñù} (hxy : x < y) : arctan x < arctan y := arctan_strictMono hxy

name: Real.arctan_le_arctan
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hxy : LE.le x y
‚ä¢ LE.le (Real.arctan x) (Real.arctan y)
decl:
@[gcongr]
lemma arctan_le_arctan {x y : ‚Ñù} (hxy : x ‚â§ y) : arctan x ‚â§ arctan y :=
  arctan_strictMono.monotone hxy

name: Real.arctan_injective
decl: theorem arctan_injective : arctan.Injective := arctan_strictMono.injective

name: Real.arctan_eq_zero_iff
decl:
@[simp]
theorem arctan_eq_zero_iff {x : ‚Ñù} : arctan x = 0 ‚Üî x = 0 :=
  .trans (by rw [arctan_zero]) arctan_injective.eq_iff

name: Real.tendsto_arctan_atTop
decl:
theorem tendsto_arctan_atTop : Tendsto arctan atTop (ùìù[<] (œÄ / 2)) :=
  tendsto_Ioo_atTop.mp tanOrderIso.symm.tendsto_atTop

name: Real.tendsto_arctan_atBot
decl:
theorem tendsto_arctan_atBot : Tendsto arctan atBot (ùìù[>] (-(œÄ / 2))) :=
  tendsto_Ioo_atBot.mp tanOrderIso.symm.tendsto_atBot

name: Real.arctan_eq_of_tan_eq
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : Eq (Real.tan x) y
hx : Membership.mem (Set.Ioo (Neg.neg (HDiv.hDiv Real.pi 2)) (HDiv.hDiv Real.pi 2)) x
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.arctan y) x
decl:
theorem arctan_eq_of_tan_eq {x y : ‚Ñù} (h : tan x = y) (hx : x ‚àà Ioo (-(œÄ / 2)) (œÄ / 2)) :
    arctan y = x :=
  injOn_tan (arctan_mem_Ioo _) hx (by rw [tan_arctan, h])

name: Real.arctan_one
decl:
@[simp]
theorem arctan_one : arctan 1 = œÄ / 4 :=
  arctan_eq_of_tan_eq tan_pi_div_four <| by constructor <;> linarith [pi_pos]

name: Real.arctan_neg
decl:
@[simp]
theorem arctan_neg (x : ‚Ñù) : arctan (-x) = -arctan x := by simp [arctan_eq_arcsin, neg_div]

name: Real.arctan_eq_arccos
initialProofState:
x : Real
h : LE.le 0 x
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.arctan x) (Real.arccos (Inv.inv (HAdd.hAdd 1 (HPow.hPow x 2)).sqrt))
decl:
theorem arctan_eq_arccos {x : ‚Ñù} (h : 0 ‚â§ x) : arctan x = arccos (‚àö(1 + x ^ 2))‚Åª¬π := by
  rw [arctan_eq_arcsin, arccos_eq_arcsin]; swap; ¬∑ exact inv_nonneg.2 (sqrt_nonneg _)
  congr 1
  rw_mod_cast [‚Üê sqrt_inv, sq_sqrt, ‚Üê one_div, one_sub_div, add_sub_cancel_left, sqrt_div,
    sqrt_sq h]
  all_goals positivity

-- The junk values for `arccos` and `sqrt` make this true even for `1 < x`.

name: Real.arccos_eq_arctan
initialProofState:
x : Real
h : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.arccos x) (Real.arctan (HDiv.hDiv (HSub.hSub 1 (HPow.hPow x 2)).sqrt x))
decl:
theorem arccos_eq_arctan {x : ‚Ñù} (h : 0 < x) : arccos x = arctan (‚àö(1 - x ^ 2) / x) := by
  rw [arccos, eq_comm]
  refine arctan_eq_of_tan_eq ?_ ‚ü®?_, ?_‚ü©
  ¬∑ rw_mod_cast [tan_pi_div_two_sub, tan_arcsin, inv_div]
  ¬∑ linarith only [arcsin_le_pi_div_two x, pi_pos]
  ¬∑ linarith only [arcsin_pos.2 h]

name: Real.arctan_inv_of_pos
initialProofState:
x : Real
h : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.arctan (Inv.inv x)) (HSub.hSub (HDiv.hDiv Real.pi 2) (Real.arctan x))
decl:
theorem arctan_inv_of_pos {x : ‚Ñù} (h : 0 < x) : arctan x‚Åª¬π = œÄ / 2 - arctan x := by
  rw [‚Üê arctan_tan (x := _ - _), tan_pi_div_two_sub, tan_arctan]
  ¬∑ norm_num
    exact (arctan_lt_pi_div_two x).trans (half_lt_self_iff.mpr pi_pos)
  ¬∑ rw [sub_lt_self_iff, ‚Üê arctan_zero]
    exact tanOrderIso.symm.strictMono h

name: Real.arctan_inv_of_neg
initialProofState:
x : Real
h : LT.lt x 0
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.arctan (Inv.inv x)) (HSub.hSub (Neg.neg (HDiv.hDiv Real.pi 2)) (Real.arctan x))
decl:
theorem arctan_inv_of_neg {x : ‚Ñù} (h : x < 0) : arctan x‚Åª¬π = -(œÄ / 2) - arctan x := by
  have := arctan_inv_of_pos (neg_pos.mpr h)
  rwa [inv_neg, arctan_neg, neg_eq_iff_eq_neg, neg_sub', arctan_neg, neg_neg] at this

name: Real.arctan_ne_mul_pi_div_two
initialProofState:
x : Real
k : Int
‚ä¢ Ne (Real.arctan x) (HDiv.hDiv (HMul.hMul (HAdd.hAdd (HMul.hMul 2 ‚Üëk) 1) Real.pi) 2)
decl:
lemma arctan_ne_mul_pi_div_two {x : ‚Ñù} : ‚àÄ (k : ‚Ñ§), arctan x ‚â† (2 * k + 1) * œÄ / 2 := by
  by_contra!
  obtain ‚ü®k, h‚ü© := this
  obtain ‚ü®lb, ub‚ü© := arctan_mem_Ioo x
  rw [h, neg_eq_neg_one_mul, mul_div_assoc, mul_lt_mul_right (by positivity)] at lb
  rw [h, ‚Üê one_mul (œÄ / 2), mul_div_assoc, mul_lt_mul_right (by positivity)] at ub
  norm_cast at lb ub; change -1 < _ at lb; omega

name: Real.arctan_add_arctan_lt_pi_div_two
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : LT.lt (HMul.hMul x y) 1
‚ä¢ LT.lt (HAdd.hAdd (Real.arctan x) (Real.arctan y)) (HDiv.hDiv Real.pi 2)
decl:
lemma arctan_add_arctan_lt_pi_div_two {x y : ‚Ñù} (h : x * y < 1) : arctan x + arctan y < œÄ / 2 := by
  cases' le_or_lt y 0 with hy hy
  ¬∑ rw [‚Üê add_zero (œÄ / 2), ‚Üê arctan_zero]
    exact add_lt_add_of_lt_of_le (arctan_lt_pi_div_two _) (tanOrderIso.symm.monotone hy)
  ¬∑ rw [‚Üê lt_div_iff‚ÇÄ hy, ‚Üê inv_eq_one_div] at h
    replace h : arctan x < arctan y‚Åª¬π := tanOrderIso.symm.strictMono h
    rwa [arctan_inv_of_pos hy, lt_tsub_iff_right] at h

name: Real.arctan_add
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : LT.lt (HMul.hMul x y) 1
‚ä¢ Eq (HAdd.hAdd (Real.arctan x) (Real.arctan y)) (Real.arctan (HDiv.hDiv (HAdd.hAdd x y) (HSub.hSub 1 (HMul.hMul x y))))
decl:
theorem arctan_add {x y : ‚Ñù} (h : x * y < 1) :
    arctan x + arctan y = arctan ((x + y) / (1 - x * y)) := by
  rw [‚Üê arctan_tan (x := _ + _)]
  ¬∑ congr
    conv_rhs => rw [‚Üê tan_arctan x, ‚Üê tan_arctan y]
    exact tan_add' ‚ü®arctan_ne_mul_pi_div_two, arctan_ne_mul_pi_div_two‚ü©
  ¬∑ rw [neg_lt, neg_add, ‚Üê arctan_neg, ‚Üê arctan_neg]
    rw [‚Üê neg_mul_neg] at h
    exact arctan_add_arctan_lt_pi_div_two h
  ¬∑ exact arctan_add_arctan_lt_pi_div_two h

name: Real.arctan_add_eq_add_pi
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : LT.lt 1 (HMul.hMul x y)
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Eq (HAdd.hAdd (Real.arctan x) (Real.arctan y)) (HAdd.hAdd (Real.arctan (HDiv.hDiv (HAdd.hAdd x y) (HSub.hSub 1 (HMul.hMul x y)))) Real.pi)
decl:
theorem arctan_add_eq_add_pi {x y : ‚Ñù} (h : 1 < x * y) (hx : 0 < x) :
    arctan x + arctan y = arctan ((x + y) / (1 - x * y)) + œÄ := by
  have hy : 0 < y := by
    have := mul_pos_iff.mp (zero_lt_one.trans h)
    simpa [hx, hx.asymm]
  have k := arctan_add (mul_inv x y ‚ñ∏ inv_lt_one_of_one_lt‚ÇÄ h)
  rw [arctan_inv_of_pos hx, arctan_inv_of_pos hy, show _ + _ = œÄ - (arctan x + arctan y) by ring,
    sub_eq_iff_eq_add, ‚Üê sub_eq_iff_eq_add', sub_eq_add_neg, ‚Üê arctan_neg, add_comm] at k
  convert k.symm using 3
  field_simp
  rw [show -x + -y = -(x + y) by ring, show x * y - 1 = -(1 - x * y) by ring, neg_div_neg_eq]

name: Real.arctan_add_eq_sub_pi
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : LT.lt 1 (HMul.hMul x y)
hx : LT.lt x 0
‚ä¢ Eq (HAdd.hAdd (Real.arctan x) (Real.arctan y)) (HSub.hSub (Real.arctan (HDiv.hDiv (HAdd.hAdd x y) (HSub.hSub 1 (HMul.hMul x y)))) Real.pi)
decl:
theorem arctan_add_eq_sub_pi {x y : ‚Ñù} (h : 1 < x * y) (hx : x < 0) :
    arctan x + arctan y = arctan ((x + y) / (1 - x * y)) - œÄ := by
  rw [‚Üê neg_mul_neg] at h
  have k := arctan_add_eq_add_pi h (neg_pos.mpr hx)
  rw [show _ / _ = -((x + y) / (1 - x * y)) by ring, ‚Üê neg_inj] at k
  simp only [arctan_neg, neg_add, neg_neg, ‚Üê sub_eq_add_neg _ œÄ] at k
  exact k

name: Real.two_mul_arctan
initialProofState:
x : Real
h‚ÇÅ : LT.lt (-1) x
h‚ÇÇ : LT.lt x 1
‚ä¢ Eq (HMul.hMul 2 (Real.arctan x)) (Real.arctan (HDiv.hDiv (HMul.hMul 2 x) (HSub.hSub 1 (HPow.hPow x 2))))
decl:
theorem two_mul_arctan {x : ‚Ñù} (h‚ÇÅ : -1 < x) (h‚ÇÇ : x < 1) :
    2 * arctan x = arctan (2 * x / (1 - x ^ 2)) := by
  rw [two_mul, arctan_add (by nlinarith)]; congr 1; ring

name: Real.two_mul_arctan_add_pi
initialProofState:
x : Real
h : LT.lt 1 x
‚ä¢ Eq (HMul.hMul 2 (Real.arctan x)) (HAdd.hAdd (Real.arctan (HDiv.hDiv (HMul.hMul 2 x) (HSub.hSub 1 (HPow.hPow x 2)))) Real.pi)
decl:
theorem two_mul_arctan_add_pi {x : ‚Ñù} (h : 1 < x) :
    2 * arctan x = arctan (2 * x / (1 - x ^ 2)) + œÄ := by
  rw [two_mul, arctan_add_eq_add_pi (by nlinarith) (by linarith)]; congr 2; ring

name: Real.two_mul_arctan_sub_pi
initialProofState:
x : Real
h : LT.lt x (-1)
‚ä¢ Eq (HMul.hMul 2 (Real.arctan x)) (HSub.hSub (Real.arctan (HDiv.hDiv (HMul.hMul 2 x) (HSub.hSub 1 (HPow.hPow x 2)))) Real.pi)
decl:
theorem two_mul_arctan_sub_pi {x : ‚Ñù} (h : x < -1) :
    2 * arctan x = arctan (2 * x / (1 - x ^ 2)) - œÄ := by
  rw [two_mul, arctan_add_eq_sub_pi (by nlinarith) (by linarith)]; congr 2; ring

name: Real.arctan_inv_2_add_arctan_inv_3
decl:
theorem arctan_inv_2_add_arctan_inv_3 : arctan 2‚Åª¬π + arctan 3‚Åª¬π = œÄ / 4 := by
  rw [arctan_add] <;> norm_num

name: Real.two_mul_arctan_inv_2_sub_arctan_inv_7
decl:
theorem two_mul_arctan_inv_2_sub_arctan_inv_7 : 2 * arctan 2‚Åª¬π - arctan 7‚Åª¬π = œÄ / 4 := by
  rw [two_mul_arctan, ‚Üê arctan_one, sub_eq_iff_eq_add, arctan_add] <;> norm_num

name: Real.two_mul_arctan_inv_3_add_arctan_inv_7
decl:
theorem two_mul_arctan_inv_3_add_arctan_inv_7 : 2 * arctan 3‚Åª¬π + arctan 7‚Åª¬π = œÄ / 4 := by
  rw [two_mul_arctan, arctan_add] <;> norm_num

name: Real.four_mul_arctan_inv_5_sub_arctan_inv_239
decl:
/-- **John Machin's 1706 formula**, which he used to compute œÄ to 100 decimal places. -/
theorem four_mul_arctan_inv_5_sub_arctan_inv_239 : 4 * arctan 5‚Åª¬π - arctan 239‚Åª¬π = œÄ / 4 := by
  rw [show 4 * arctan _ = 2 * (2 * _) by ring, two_mul_arctan, two_mul_arctan, ‚Üê arctan_one,
    sub_eq_iff_eq_add, arctan_add] <;> norm_num

name: Real.continuous_arctan
decl:
@[continuity]
theorem continuous_arctan : Continuous arctan :=
  continuous_subtype_val.comp tanOrderIso.toHomeomorph.continuous_invFun

name: Real.continuousAt_arctan
decl:
theorem continuousAt_arctan {x : ‚Ñù} : ContinuousAt arctan x :=
  continuous_arctan.continuousAt

name: Real.coe_tanPartialHomeomorph
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_tanPartialHomeomorph : ‚áëtanPartialHomeomorph = tan :=
  rfl

name: Real.coe_tanPartialHomeomorph_symm
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_tanPartialHomeomorph_symm : ‚áëtanPartialHomeomorph.symm = arctan :=
  rfl
